title: Furnished Tenanted Large 3 Bedroom Apartment @ Iconic Res
details:
Tastefully furnished(Teak Furniture) 3 bedroom large apartment @ Iconic Residencies now available for sale.The apartment comes fully tiled, fully air-conditioned with 2,190sqft floor area.
The apartment consist of 3 large bedrooms(master bedroom with en-suite and balcony),large living & dining areas, pantry & maids quarters.
The apartment presently tenanted with a rental income of LKR 250,000/- PM and also the lease could be terminated giving 3 months notice.

Quoted Price : LKR 58 Million

NO BROKERS/AGENTS PLEASE

JV Project with CP.
